title: Constitutional Council likely to ratify name of new IGP today
byline: The Constitutional Council is scheduled to convene today (12).

title: Several spells of showers expected across the country today
byline: Showers will occur at times in the Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in the Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts.

title: Donald Trump announces another 90-day pause on China tariffs
byline: President Donald Trump on Monday delayed high U.S. tariffs on Chinese goods from snapping back into place for another 90 days, a White House official has said.

title: 26 injured after bus-tipper truck head-on collision in Minneriya
byline: A total of 26 individuals have been injured in a road accident that occurred along the Colombo-Batticaloa main road in Batu Oya, Minneriya, police stated.

title: Gold will be exempted from tariffs, says Donald Trump
byline: US President Donald Trump said Monday that gold will be exempted from tariffs, leading to a material drop in gold futures prices.

title: Fuel taxes cannot be reduced until loans are fully repaid – Energy Minister
byline: There is no possibility of removing the taxes imposed on fuel until the loans obtained by the Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (are fully repaid, Minister of Energy Kumara Jayakody has stated.

title: PM Harini and Indian High Commissioner discuss ways to strengthen bilateral cooperation
byline: High Commissioner of India in Colombo Santhosh Jha has called on Prime Minister Dr Harini Amarasuriya at the Prime Minister’s Office.

title: Over 77,000 tourists arrive in first 10 days of August
byline: The number of tourists who arrived in the country in the first 10 days of August stood at 77,482, the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority has announced.

title: Montana plane crash: Two aircraft collide on runway, spark huge fire
byline: A small plane landing on Monday at a Montana airport crashed into parked aircraft, triggering a large fire but causing no serious injuries, authorities said.

title: Prince Harry, Meghan and Netflix extend partnership for streaming programmes
byline: Prince Harry and Meghan have extended their partnership with Netflix and their media company, Archewell Productions, with a multiyear, first-look deal, the couple announced on Monday.

title: Nepal offers free climbs to 97 peaks as tourism to Everest surges
byline: Nepal will make 97 of its Himalayan mountains free to climb for the next two years in a bid to boost tourism in some of its more remote areas.

title: Father and son drown after boat capsizes in Parakrama Samudraya
byline: A father and son have drowned after a boat capsized in the Parakrama Samudraya in Polonnaruwa, police stated.

title: Cabinet approves removal of Dhammika Jayasundara from post of General Manager Railways
byline: The Cabinet of Ministers has granted approval to the proposal to remove Dhammika Jayasundara from the post of General Manager of Sri Lanka Railways.

title: Largest meteor shower of 2025 visible tonight and tomorrow
byline: The largest meteor shower of 2025 will be visible from midnight today (12) and into early hours of tomorrow, according to Astrophysicist and Engineering Lecturer Gihan Weerasekera.

title: 2025 National Youth Conference underway
byline: The 2025 National Youth Conference got underway at the Sugathadasa Stadium in Colombo, a short while ago.

title: UN Rights Chief to present report on “Human Rights situation in Sri Lanka” at next month’s UNHRC session
byline: United Nations High Commissioner for Human Rights Volker Türk, who visited Sri Lanka in June, is scheduled to present his report titled “Situation of Human Rights in Sri Lanka” at the upcoming 60th session of the Human Rights Council in Geneva, Switzerland.

title: Horana Urban Council sessions postponed for 14 days due to dispute among UNP members
byline: The Horana Urban Council sessions have been postponed for 14 days due to a dispute among United National Party (UNP) members.

title: Another 691 individuals arrested during special police raids yesterday
byline: A total of 691 individuals have been arrested on suspicion of being involved in criminal activities and also over illicit liquor and drug-related offenses during a special island-wide operation conducted yesterday (11).

title: US teen influencer has been stranded in the Chilean Antarctic since landing without permission
byline: What was intended as a fundraising mission for cancer research has become a nightmare for American teen influencer Ethan Guo, who has been stuck since June in a remote location in Chilean territory in Antarctica.

title: President calls for responsible youth leadership, rejects dynastic politics
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake emphasized the urgent need to foster a new generation of responsible young leaders, rejecting the concept of political dynasties or youth leaders who merely focus on protecting family power.

title: Body of A/L student found in well near tuition class in Vavuniya
byline: The body of a girl studying for the GCE Advanced Level examination was found in a well near a private tuition class in Vairavapuliyankulam, Vavuniya.

title: SJB hands over no-confidence motion against Deputy Defence Minister Aruna Jayasekara
byline: The Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) has handed over a no-confidence motion against the Deputy Minister of Defence, Major General Aruna Jayasekara (Retd) to the Speaker of House, a short while ago.

title: Warrant issued for the arrest of ex-Minister Rajitha Senaratne
byline: The Colombo Magistrate’s Court today (12) issued a warrant for the arrest of former Minister Rajitha Senaratne, who has been named as a suspect in an investigation conducted by the Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC).

title: Cabinet approval granted to recruit 62,000 to public service: President
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake says his government’s aspiration is to bring the state into modernity.

title: Constitutional Council approves Priyantha Weerasooriya as IGP
byline: The Constitutional Council has approved President Anura Kumara Dissanayake’s recommendation to appoint Acting Inspector General of Police (IGP) Priyantha Weerasooriya as the 37th Inspector General of Police of the country.

title: Footballer Cristiano Ronaldo and long-time partner Georgina Rodriguez announce engagement
byline: Soccer great Cristiano Ronaldo and his long-term partner Georgina Rodriguez are engaged.

title: Sri Lanka to launch floating solar power projects to achieve zero carbon emissions by 2050
byline: The Cabinet of Ministers has granted approval to call for proposals from companies to provide consultancy services to carry-out feasibility studies and environmental impact assessments to launch floating solar power projects.

title: EU leaders say Ukraine should have freedom to decide its future
byline: Ukrainians must have the freedom to decide their own future, European Union member states said on Tuesday, weighing in ahead of talks between U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin, opens new tab on Friday.

title: ‘Ella Weekend Express’ from August 16
byline: The Department of Railways has announced the introduction of a new train service between Colombo and Badulla to cater to the high demand from both local and foreign tourists.

title: Gamini Senarathne to be appointed Commissioner General of Buddhist Affairs
byline: The Cabinet of Ministers has granted approval to the proposal submitted by the Minister of Buddha Shasana, Religious and Cultural Activities to appoint R. M. Gamini Senarathne to the post of Commissioner General of Buddhist Affairs.

title: No-confidence motion handed over against Deputy Defence Minister Aruna Jayasekara
byline: A no-confidence motion against Deputy Minister of Defence, Major General Aruna Jayasekara (Retd) has been handed over to Speaker of House Dr Jagath Wickramaratne by the Opposition today (12).

title: Former Pradeshiya Sabha member dies in Meegoda shooting
byline: A former Pradeshiya Sabha member has sustained injuries in a shooting incident in Meegoda, Police stated.

title: Taylor Swift announces new album called ‘The Life of a Showgirl’
byline: Superstar Taylor Swift on Tuesday announced her 12th studio album, “The Life of a Showgirl”.
